channel.title: Environs on Sam Havron

item.title: Environs
item.description: A curated list of places that I like and recommend in New York, presented in no particular order (WIP). browse McNally Jackson Independent Booksellers. In Nolita (Manhattan), closest to Bowery , Grand St , or Spring St . eat Wu’s Wonton King. In Chinatown (Manhattan), from East Broadway . Café Henri. In Long Island City (Queens), from Vernon Boulevard-Jackson Avenue . Alley 41 蜀巷. In Flushing (Queens), from Flushing-Main St .
